chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (s0 s1 : state) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) (M2 prec_list s0 s1) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) (app 1%N tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 1%N pl (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (app 1%N tl)

M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
Inductive N : Set := N0 : N | Npos : positive -> N For Npos: Argument scope is [positive_scope]

Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
preDTA = Map state : Set
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
state = Map prec_list : Set
union_s0d_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (s0 s1 : state) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) (M2 prec_list s0 s1) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) (app 0%N tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 0%N pl (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (app 0%N tl)
mpl_compat_4 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
union_s0d_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M0 prec_list) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M0 prec_list)) (app c tl)
union_s0d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)

mpl_compat_5 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~0) pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
mpl_compat_6 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)

mpl_compat_1 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s0 s2
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)

uad_conv_1 = fun a : ad => match a with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~1 end : ad -> ad
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
BinNatDef.N.succ_double = fun x : N => match x with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~1 end : N -> N Argument scope is [N_scope]

st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop

mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r

mpl_compat_7_def = fun s : state => forall (c : ad) (pl l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> MapGet prec_list (union_mpl_0 c pl s) c = Some (union_pl pl l) : state -> Prop
rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
